item.title: Someone has dumped garden furniture, 14th August
item.description:
These appeared overnight. Partially blocking pavement access particularly for those that use pushchairs and wheelchairs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marmadon Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bin continuous weekly problem, 14th August
item.description:
I was directed from the council website to this site but it says you can't use this site to report domestic bins. Please send me link to the correct site. However, this is a continuous problem on our street due to overflowing bins these are not emptied on Mondays. Rubbish just increases and is spread all over the street. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Frobisher Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road never cleaned/swept, 14th August
item.description:
This road being a cul de sac has not been swept for months. The road sweeper comes fairly regular to sweep The Avenue and also Wisley Road BUT never comes down The Green. I wish to remind you that we also pay our council tax as well as everyone else. Please clean !.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, The Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Contractors Rubbish, 14th August
item.description:
Following your contractors replacing the damaged drain covers, they have left this area in appalling condition. They have left all the repair rubbish all over this area. Peabody should have them return to clear up this mess. It might be woodlands but they would not been allowed to leave all this rubbish if it was in a street. I can't belive that Peabody had not checked on there work.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastern Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branches overhanging and leaning into overhead cables, 14th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Leith Hill, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Overhanging bushes and trees, 14th August
